text: Allan Pineda Lindo (born November 28, 1974), known professionally as apl.de.ap (), is a Filipino-American rapper, singer and record producer. He is a founding member of the hip hop group Black Eyed Peas. ==Discography== ===Mixtapes=== *2011: It's Me Applebees *2021: It's Me Applebees II *2022: It's Me Applebees III: More Applebees ===Singles=== *2012: "We Can Be Anything" *2012: "Fly" *2013: "Going Out" *2015: "Be" featuring Honey Cocaine & Jessica Reynoso As featured artist *2010: "Spaceship" (with Benny Benassi, Kelis, and Jean-Baptiste) *2012: "El Presidente" (with Slapshock) *2013: "Gettin' Dumb" (with will.i.am and 2NE1) Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century American rappers Category:21st-century American rappers Category:American adoptees Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Rappers from Los Angeles Category:Black Eyed Peas members
title: Apl.de.ap
